title: Textile Sample, "Mikado"
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: printed on plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 57.8 x 59.1 cm (22 3/4 x 23 1/4 in.)
description: Printed plain weave in a red and orange checkerboard with an orange and white flower pattern. Red squares are printed with orange flowers with a white square in the center while the orange squares have white flowers with a black square in the center. Number 651.
